meanings.sent1: The antitubercular medicine helped stop the spread of the disease.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend antitubercular drugs to fight tuberculosis effectively.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was as antitubercular as a shield against the evil bacteria.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to stay healthy was like an antitubercular force protecting her from illness.
meanings.sent5: The antitubercular treatment was like a powerful shield guarding against tuberculosis.

meanings.definition: A drug used to treat tuberculosis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed an antitubercular to combat the infection.
meanings.sent2: She took the antitubercular regularly to fight off the disease.
meanings.sent3: The antitubercular pill was so big, it felt like swallowing a tiny rock.
meanings.sent4: His hope for recovery was as strong as the antitubercular medication he was taking.
meanings.sent5: The antitubercular drug worked like a hero, defeating the tuberculosis bacteria.
